not_a_repo: ❌ Error: This directory is not a Git repository. Please run `git init` first.
branch_warning: ⚠️  WARNING: You are about to commit directly to the '{branch}' branch.
confirm_prompt: This action is not recommended. Are you sure you want to continue? (y/n):
cannot_determine_branch: Could not determine the current branch, please check.
no_changes: ✅ No changes to commit. Everything is up to date.
empty_commit_message: ❌ Commit message cannot be empty. Aborted.
non_fast_forward_hint: Hint: It seems the remote branch has new commits.
pull_prompt: Do you want to automatically run 'git pull --rebase' and try again? (y/n):
pull_failed: ❌ `git pull --rebase` failed. There might be conflicts. Please resolve them manually.
push_after_pull_failed: ❌ Push still failed after pulling. Please check manually.
pull_cancelled: 👍  Cancelled. Please run `git pull` manually before pushing again.
force_reset_warning_line1: You are about to DELETE all local changes (uncommitted & untracked).
force_reset_warning_line2: The current branch will be hard reset to match '{branch}'.
force_reset_prompt: To confirm, please type the exact branch name '{branch}':
force_reset_confirmed: Confirmation successful. Starting the force reset process...
force_reset_success: Done! Your branch is now identical to '{branch}'.
force_reset_cancelled: Confirmation did not match. Action cancelled for safety.
no_changes_to_stash: No local changes to stash. Continuing...
stash_pop_conflict: ⚠️  Conflict detected while applying stash. Please resolve conflicts manually.
tag_push_failed: ❌ Failed to push tag '{tag}'. Please do it manually.
update_branch_failed: ❌ Failed to update branch '{branch}'. Please check manually.
commit_confirm_prompt: Do you want to proceed with this commit? (Y/n):
no_changes_to_commit_proceed_pull: ✅ No changes to commit. Pulling latest changes from remote...
command_not_found: Error: Command '{cmd}' not found. Is Git installed and in your PATH?
set_lang_success: ✅ Default language has been set to '{lang}'
hook_failed: Hook '{hook}' failed with non-zero exit code. Aborting.
hook_parse_error: Invalid hook command for '{hook}'. Please check your .gitsyncrc.
